# unarchiveFromDataTransformerName

**Type Property**

The name of the value transformer that attempts to unarchive data from an object you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
static let unarchiveFromDataTransformerName: NSValueTransformerName
```

## Discussion

The transformer this property references returns the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] instance created by archiving the value. This transformer requires that an object supports [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCoding] in order for the transformer to archive and unarchive.

## Type Properties

- **isNilTransformerName**: This value transformer returns true if the value is nil.
- **isNotNilTransformerName**: This value transformer returns true if the value is non-nil.
- **keyedUnarchiveFromDataTransformerName**: The name of the value transformer that attempts to unarchive data stored inside a keyed archive in an object you provide.
- **negateBooleanTransformerName**: This value transformer negates a boolean value, transforming true to false and false to true.
- **secureUnarchiveFromDataTransformerName**: The name of the value transformer that creates then returns an object by attempting to unarchive the data to a class that supports secure coding.
